overview: When a mysterious virus spreads from Haiti to Miami turning people into terrifying, bloodthirsty creatures, a small group of survivors tries to escape from the City of the Walking Dead.  Remake of the 1980 horror movie "Incubo Sulla Citt√† Contaminata" aka Nightmare City from director Umberto Lenzi.
tagline: Welcome to the city of the walking dead.
title: Nightmare City
